dcterms:creator: A. Shahroudy
J. Liu
T.-T. Ng
G. Wang
dcterms:description: NTU RGB+D is currently one of the most widely used action recognition datasets, containing four modalities including RGB videos, depth sequences, infrared videos, and 3D skeleton data. The authors conducted experiments specifically on the skeleton data.
dcterms:title: NTU RGB+D

dcterms:creator: J. Liu
A. Shahroudy
G. Wang
L.-Y. Duan
A. K. Chichung
dcterms:description: NTU RGB+D 120 is an extended version of the NTU RGB+D dataset, featuring more subjects and action categories, making it a more challenging dataset for action recognition tasks.
dcterms:title: NTU RGB+D 120
